name: 円香
trans: How many more episodes do we have to go?

name: 円香
text:
ていうか、このドラマ
恋人の代わりに配信する流れから……
trans:
You know, the setting of this drama's like, the
protagonist broadcasts live streams in his lover's
place...

name: 円香
text:
いつのまにか恋人を殺した関係者に報復するっていう
設定が出てきて、それメインになってる
trans:
Then he eventually gets to take revenge on the
people involved with the killing of his lover. That's
the gist of it.

name: 透
text:
戦ってるね
めっちゃ

name: 円香
text:
……まあ、ノリと勢いだけで話が進む方が
頭使わないで観れるから助かるけど
trans:
...Well, it's easier to watch a story that goes with
the flow and momentum, since it's doesn't use your
head much.

name: 円香
text:
……夜食ね
それなら私も行く
trans:
...Getting a night snack, huh.
I'll tag along for some too.

name: 円香
trans: Move already, or I'll knock into you.

name: 円香
text: じゃあ……お茶漬けにする？
trans:
Then... how about we make some ochatsuke*?
*(Rice in soup / tea, with toppings)

name: 円香
text:
……ねえ、ここ
私の布団だけど

name: 円香
text:
……ベッド
行ってくれないと眠れない
trans:
...If you don't get back into your bed, I won't be able
to sleep.

name: 透
text:
んー……
樋口、使っていいよ
trans:
Hmー...
You can sleep there, Higuchi.

name: 透
text:
……すごいね
段々恋人になってくやつ
trans:
...Amazing wasn't it.
The part where he slowly turn into his lover.

name: 透
text:
主人公の顔から
主人公が消えて
trans:
The protagonist's face, slowly ceases to be the
protagonist.

name: 透
text:
死んだ恋人の顔になって
段々
trans: Gradually, turning into the dead lover's face.

name: 透
trans: I couldn't take my eyes off it.

name: 透
trans:
Aahー, that one.
It was Guuー.

name: 透
trans:
I wonder,
can I do it too.

name: off
text: 浅倉にできないことはない

name: 透
text:
思ったんだけど
なんか……
trans: I was thinking about it, but...
